paper_abstract: Embedding of paths have attracted much attention in the parallel processing. Many-to-many communication is one of the most central issues in various interconnection networks. In this paper, we investigate the problem of many-to-many unpaired n-disjoint path covers in the n-dimensional hypercube Q(n) and obtain the following result. For any two sets S and T of n vertices in different parts, Q(n) has many-to-many unpaired n-disjoint (S, T)-path covers except the case that there exists a vertex v such that N(Qn) (v) = S and v is not an element of T or N(Qn) (v) = T and v is not an element of S. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Many-to-many n-disjoint path covers in n-dimensional hypercubes
